rules_text: When Aggravator of Herds enters, exile the top five cards of your library. You may cast creature cards exiled this way until the end of your next turn.
flavor_text: [i]Not all demons prefer endless torment. Sometimes, just being the top of the food chain is enough.[/i]

Creature heavy topened combo / midrange value
